document.masterDocTitle: A sea of worms: polychaete checklist of the Adriatic Sea

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A sea of worms: polychaete checklist of the Adriatic Sea

bibRefCitation.author: Grube
bibRefCitation.refString: Grube, A. E. (1860) Beschreibung neuer oder wenig bekannter Anneliden. Archiv Fur Naturgeschicthe, 26, 71 - 118.

subSubSection.paragraph:
LITERATURE
RECORDS
:
Stossich 1883
;
Graeffe 1905
;
Požar-Domac 1983
, 1986 ,
1994
; Giangrande et al . 2003 ;
Castelli et al . 2008
.

REMARKS : The specific epithet of the species
Phyllodoce lamelligera
(Gmelin in
Linnaeus, 1788
) results from a misspelling of the original
Nereis lamellifera
by
Pallas ( 1788 )
. Both the description by
Pallas ( 1788 )
, and the posterior description by Gmelin in
Linnaeus ( 1788 )
, can fit numerous different species, and so the species was considered by
Pleijel ( 1991 )
as a nomen dubium . Considering that, it is not clear to which species of
Phyllodoce
the Adriatic records of
P. lamelligera
refer to.

bibRefCitation.author: Lamarck
bibRefCitation.refString: Lamarck, J. B. (1818) Histoire Naturelle des Animaux sans vertebres. Deterville, Paris, 612 pp.

RECORDS
: BM 50 , BM 51 , BM 53 ; coastal locations in the vicinity of Rovinj ( NA ), in 2008 (F. Pleijel and A. Nygren, pers. comm. ).
REMARKS : These are the first records from the Adriatic Sea.
